What are your office hours?: We’re open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5 PM.
Where are you located?: We’re at 123 Main Street, Suite 400, Allen, TX.
Do you accept walk-ins?: We do not accept walk-ins. Please schedule an appointment.
What insurance do you accept?: We accept Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, and Blue Cross Blue Shield.
Do you do cleanings or checkups?: Yes, we offer routine dental cleanings and annual physicals.
